columns.name: cache_parameter_group_name
columns.description: The name of the cache parameter group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the cache parameter group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description for the cache parameter group.

columns.name: cache_parameter_group_family
columns.description: The name of the cache parameter group family that this cache parameter group is compatible with.

columns.name: is_global
columns.description: Indicates whether the parameter group is associated with a Global Datastore.
